comments: Hunter (ATL) legally contests Herro's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Bogdanovic (ATL) is the last player to make contact with the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Adebayo (MIA) establishes himself in Murray's (ATL) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Adebayo (MIA) establishes himself in Krejci's (ATL) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Bogdanovic (ATL) initiates contact to Highsmith's (MIA) body that affects his shot attempt near the rim.
Highsmith (MIA) legally contests Murray's (ATL) jump shot, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released.
Hunter (ATL) initiates contact to Butler's (MIA) body that affects his SQBR during the drive.

Replay review of the foul called on Bogdanovic (ATL) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful.  Bogdanovic is drawn into the air on the pump fake and initiates illegal contact with Butler (MIA) that affects his shot attempt.

After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the floor of a defensive goaltending stands.  Adebayo (MIA) blocks the shot attempt after the ball reaches its apex and is on its downward trajectory towards the basket.
Bogdanovic (ATL) and Martin (MIA) mutually engage and disengage with one another off ball.
Bogdanovic (ATL) legally contests Herro's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Bogdanovic (ATL) cleanly blocks the shot attempt in the post by Butler (MIA).
Jovic (MIA) initiates contact to Bogdanovic's (ATL) body which affects his driving shot attempt.
Adebayo (MIA) continues moving laterally, but stops and firms up in a screening position in Hunter's (ATL) path before contact occurs.
Hunter (ATL) legally contests Jovic's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Bogdanovic (ATL) legally contests Highsmith's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Butler (MIA) legally contests Murray's (ATL) jump shot, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released.
Murray (ATL) brushes Herro's (MIA) arm and marginal contact occurs during Herro's driving shot attempt.

call_type: Turnover:  Out of Bounds - Bad Pass Turn
comments: Bogdanovic (ATL) throws an errant pass out of bounds.
Adebayo (MIA) moves alongside Capela (ATL) and marginal body contact occurs during Capela's (ATL) upward shooting motion.
Jovic (MIA) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Jovic (MIA) legally contests Krejci's (ATL) jump shot attempt.
